Subject: Damage Item FRM#80007- Tanagra Avenues.

 

Dear Samira,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

During the recent store layout change in Avenues, Daum item accidentally broken by the VM team (photos attached).

 

An incident report FRM#80007 has been submitted on FOCUS platform.

 

Please advise on the next steps and if we can follow up with the insurance process.

 

Regards.

 



RAMI NAKHLAEH NAOOM​​​​

SENIOR STORE MANAGER

HABCHI & CHALHOUB WLL

KUWAIT

Subject: Damage Item FRM#80007- Tanagra Avenues.

 

Dear Samira,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

During the recent store layout change in Avenues, Daum item accidentally broken by the VM team (photos attached).

 

An incident report FRM#80007 has been submitted on FOCUS platform.

 

Please advise on the next steps and if we can follow up with the insurance process.

 

Regards.

 



RAMI NAKHLAEH NAOOM​​​​
